title: Lynx OOL Applications
body:
[Twitter:](https://twitter.com/lynx_gg)
[Facebook:](https://www.facebook.com/lynxg/)
[Website:](http://lynx.gg/index.php)
[Application for Players](https://goo.gl/forms/W6KxsRee4ehbGV9k2)
Coaches and managers to contact us through social media.

We are happy to announce we will be competing in the oceanic challenger series but we are still adamant on having an OOL roster for split 2 of 2017.

**Here is a few of the things Lynx Will Provide:** 
**Players:**
$1,000 per player for promoting into OCS
The opportunity to be the sub for our main roster
The opportunity to move up to OCS lineup if you outperform main roster counterpart

**Coaches**
$500 for making it into the OCS
Opportunity to work under head coach and assist OCS

**Manager**
$200 for promoting into OCS

replies.body: So same rules as before, nothing less than diamond 2?
When will you just admit that you're not good at the game and nobody wants you on their team. You're the biggest joke on the OCE boards.
As soon as I am proven wrong. how many times do I have to say it?
You've been proven wrong on many occasions, you're just blind to the truth.

If that is true then why are you bothering to reply to me?

My initial question was directed at the creator of the thread, no one else.
Are there any conditions for applying
The higher the rank, the better the chances are what I would like to say.
